shortDescription: Unified Search System & List Components Complete Optimization
problem: All list components (Buildings, Contacts, Projects, Parkings, Storages, Units) had duplicate search logic, inconsistent patterns, type safety issues, and poor performance
cause: Technical debt from rapid development - components built independently without shared patterns, leading to massive code duplication and maintenance nightmares

solution.phase1: Created centralized SearchSystem class with unified search/filter/sort logic
solution.phase2: Integrated SearchSystem into ALL list components (6 major modules)
solution.phase3: Fixed all TypeScript issues - eliminated "any" types completely
solution.phase4: Optimized performance with debouncing and proper React patterns
solution.phase5: Added Tailwind animations for smooth UI transitions

technicalDetails.searchSystem: Enterprise-grade centralized search engine with fuzzy matching
technicalDetails.components: 6 major list components fully refactored and optimized

testing.compilation: All TypeScript checks pass - zero errors
testing.functionality: All list components search/filter/sort working perfectly

notes: MAJOR MILESTONE: Complete unification of search functionality across the entire application. This is an enterprise-grade solution following DRY principles and best practices.
